tool_name: ChatGPT Detector - AI Powered ChatGPT Answer Detector
tool_description: Are you concerned about distinguishing human-written text from machine-generated text? Look no further than ChatGPT Detector! Our advanced AI text detection tool accurately identifies the origin of text, whether it's written by a human or generated by OpenAI's ChatGPT model. With support for over 140 languages and 6 distinct methods of classification, our tool achieves a 93% accuracy rate. Protect your business from fraudulent text with ChatGPT Detector.

required_parameters.default: Support over 140 languages, try it now :)
